name: Turtle On A Boat
description:
Welcome to Turtle on a Boat! Use WASD to navigate the poop deck ye salt dawg! Yeet your anchor onto Medieval Sharks with Left Click and Right Click to Dash because what Game Jam game doesn't have a dash?

Left click (if anchor has not been thrown): throw anchor at mouse position

Left click (if anchor has been thrown):

- hold down left click to catch the anchor

- let go of left click before the anchor reaches you to have the anchor bounce off your shell

Right Click: Dash

WASD: Move

Created by kgc & Momo1478  for Game Makers Toolkit Jam 2021

BGM by KLY
